data.title: Caffeine paradise with friendly, knowledgable service.
data.text:
The Roastery hosted set for the movie "Soul Damage" I worked on this winter. Nice atmosphere, decent pricing and a good "cup o joe" as well as the many exotic concoctions for more discerning  and adventurous taste, like mine. Bold and black baby , that's how I like mine with a splash or two of hazelnut.
Well worth the stop. "Hey Corey, how bout a refill"?
